description: Reports cursor positions while typing on multiline edit controls.

translations.description:
Allows you to find out how to interact with the focused control, useful for new computer users new to Windows and to NVDA.
	Press NVDA+H to get a short help message on using the focused control, such as moving through tables, checkboxes and so on.
Докладва позицията на курсора, докато пишете в многоредови текстови контроли.

An advanced clock and calendar for NVDA.
NVDA+F12, get current time.
NVDA+F12 pressed twice quickly, get current date.
NVDA+F12 pressed three times quickly, reports the current day, the week number, the current year and the remaining days before the end of the year.
For other instructions, press Add-on help button in add-ons manager.

Giver dig mulighed for at finde ud af, hvordan du kan bruge den kontrol, der er i fokus. Dette er nyttigt for nye computerbrugere eller nye brugere af Windows eller NVDA.
	Tryk NVDA+h for at få en kort hjælpemeddelelse om, hvordan du bruger kontrollen, som er i fokus, f.eks. få hjælp til, hvordan du flytter gennem tabeller, markerer en checkboks o.s.v.
Teilt die Position des Cursors während der Eingabe in mehrzeiligen Eingabefeldern mit.

Diese Erweiterung hilft Ihnen herauszufinden, wie Sie mit dem fokussierten Steuerelement interagieren können. Dies ist bspw. für Computerneulinge, die dazu im Umgang mit Windows und NVDA noch unerfahren sind hilfreich.
	Drücken Sie NVDA+H, um eine kurze Hilfemeldung über die Verwendung des fokussierten Steuerelement zu erhalten, wie z.B. das Bewegen durch Tabellen, das aktivieren von Kontrollkästchen usw.
Add-on to speak clipboard information.
Anuncia las posiciones del cursor al teclear en cuadros de edición multilínea.

Te permite descubrir cómo interactuar con el control enfocado, útil para usuarios aprendices de ordenadores nuevos en Windows y nuevos en NVDA.
	Pulsa NVDA+H para obtener un breve mensaje de ayuda sobre la utilización del control enfocado, tal como el movimiento a través de las tablas, casillas de verificación y así sucesivamente.
موقعیتِ مکان‌نما را در حالی که در کنترل‌های چندخطّی تایپ میکنید اعلام میکند.
Ilmoittaa kohdistimen sijainnin monirivisissä muokkaussäätimissä kirjoitettaessa.
Annonce les positions du curseur lors de la saisie dans les contrôles d'édition multilignes.
Indica as posicións do cursor ó escribir en controis de edición multiliña.

Allows you to find out how to interact with the focused control, useful for new computer users new to Windows and to NVDA.
	Press NVDA+H to get a short help message on using the focused control, such as moving through tables, checkboxes and so on.

An advanced clock and calendar for NVDA.
NVDA+F12, get current time.
NVDA+F12 pressed twice quickly, get current date.
NVDA+F12 pressed three times quickly, reports the current day, the week number, the current year and the remaining days before the end of the year.
For other instructions, press Add-on help button in add-ons manager.
Izvještava o položajima kursora tijekom tipkanja u višerednim kontrolama za uređivanje.

Allows you to find out how to interact with the focused control, useful for new computer users new to Windows and to NVDA.
	Press NVDA+H to get a short help message on using the focused control, such as moving through tables, checkboxes and so on.

Permette di ricevere dei suggerimenti sulla modalità di interazione con il controllo evidenziato, utile specialmente per i nuovi utenti che si avvicinano al computer, a Windows e a NVDA.
Premere NVDA+h per ricevere un breve suggerimento su come utilizzare il controllo evidenziato, ad esempio come spostarsi tra le tabelle, caselle di controllo e così via.

Allows you to find out how to interact with the focused control, useful for new computer users new to Windows and to NVDA.
	Press NVDA+H to get a short help message on using the focused control, such as moving through tables, checkboxes and so on.
დამატებების განახლების ფუნქციის კონცეფციის განხორციელების მტკიცებულება (NVDA Core issue 3208)

Allows you to find out how to interact with the focused control, useful for new computer users new to Windows and to NVDA.
	Press NVDA+H to get a short help message on using the focused control, such as moving through tables, checkboxes and so on.

Allows you to find out how to interact with the focused control, useful for new computer users new to Windows and to NVDA.
	Press NVDA+H to get a short help message on using the focused control, such as moving through tables, checkboxes and so on.

Hiermee kunt u ontdekken hoe u met het besturingselement met focus kunt werken, wat handig is voor nieuwe computergebruikers die niet bekend zijn met Windows en NVDA.
	Druk op NVDA+H om een kort hulpbericht te krijgen over het gebruik van het besturingselement met focus, zoals bladeren door tabellen, selectievakjes enzovoort.

Pozwala dowiedzieć się, jak kontrolki sfokusowanej, co jest przydatne początkujących użytkowników komputerów i systemu Windows z NVDA.
	Naciśnij klawisze NVDA+H, aby uzyskać krótki komunikat o pomocy w zakresie korzystania z fokusu, takiego jak przechodzenie przez tabele, pola wyboru i tak dalej.
Permite o acesso a uma agenda acessível

Possibilita que você descubra como interagir com o controle em foco, útil para novos usuários de computador no Windows e no NVDA.
	Pressione NVDA+H para obter uma mensagem curta de ajuda sobre o uso do controle focalizado, como navegar pelas tabelas, caixas de seleção e assim por diante.
Indica as posições do cursor ao escrever  em controlos de edição de várias linhas.
Raportează pozițiile cursorului în timpul tastării pe controalele de editare multiline.

Allows you to find out how to interact with the focused control, useful for new computer users new to Windows and to NVDA.
	Press NVDA+H to get a short help message on using the focused control, such as moving through tables, checkboxes and so on.

Poskytuje informácie o práve zameranom prvku. Užitočné pre tých, ktorí začínajú pracovať v systéme Windows alebo sa učia pracovať s NVDA.
	Pomoc pre zameraný prvok získate po stlačení skratky nvda+h.

Omogoča vam, da spoznate kako delati s kontrolnikom v žarišču. To je uporabno za tiste, ki ste novi v Oknih in v NVDA.
	Pritisnite NvDA+H za to, da vam NVDA poda kratko sporočilo, kako  delati s posameznim kontrolnikom, kot je premikanje po tabelah, delo z izbirniki in druge možnosti.

Dozvoljava vam da saznate kako da koristite fokusiranu kontrolu, korisno za nove korisnike računara kao i Windowsa i programa NVDA.
	Pritisnite NVDA+H da dobijete kratku poruku pomoći za korišćenje kontrole sa programom NVDA, kao što je kretanje kroz tabele, izborna polja i tako dalje.
Bluetooth Audio är ett tillägg till NVDA som  förbättrar ljudkvalitén när man använder bluetoothhörlurar eller bluetoothhögtalare.

குவிமையத்தில் இருக்கும் கட்டுப்பாடுகளுடன் எவ்வாறு அளவளாவுவது என்றறிய இது உதவுகிறது.கணினி, அல்லது விண்டோஸ்/என்விடிஏவின் துவக்க நிலை பயனர்களுக்கு இது பயன்படும்.
	தேர்வுப் பெட்டி, அட்டவணை போன்ற கட்டுப்பாடு குறித்த சிறு உதவிக் குறிப்பைப் பெற, என்விடிஏ+h விசையை அழுத்தவும்

Odaklanan kontrolle nasıl etkileşim kurabileceğinizle ilgili yardım almanızı sağlar, bilgisayar ve NVDA'yı yeni kullanmaya başlayanlar için faydalı olabilir.
	Odaklanan kontrolle ilgili, örneğin bir tablo, liste, menü vb, kısa bir yardım almak için NvDA+H tuşlarına basın.

Дозволяє отримувати коротку довідку про те, як взаємодіяти з елементом керування у фокусі; корисно для новачків, які не знайомі ні з Windows, ні з NVDA.
	Натисніть NVDA+H для отримання короткої довідки про взаємодію з елементом керування у фокусі, таким, як таблиця, прапорець і так далі.

translations.displayName: Trợ Giúp Sử Dụng Điều Khiển
translations.description:
Allows you to find out how to interact with the focused control, useful for new computer users new to Windows and to NVDA.
	Press NVDA+H to get a short help message on using the focused control, such as moving through tables, checkboxes and so on.
在多行编辑控件上输入时报告光标位置。
附加元件更新功能的概念實作證明(NVDA Core issue 3208)
